Body: Possible Duplicate:  My sense home screen has stopped auto rotating, how do I fix it?  I have the same problem as a few other people who have posted questions:I got the HTC Desire Z about 2 days ago, and initially when the keyboard was closed away i could rotate the phone, and the homepage would also rotate. Now the homepage has stopped rotating, however everything else rotates fine (ie apps, camera, settings menu etc.) I have gone through the screen rotate settings but have found no fix, any ideas/simple fixes without having to dabble with 'ROM' things, whatever they are? That all sounds far too technical for me... :)I have also tried downloading a Screen Rotate app, which didn't help at all.Thanks in advance
Title: HTC Desire Z Home Screen has Stopped Rotating, wat do?
